author: John Gruber
description:
The whole thing is just weird looking, for one thing. As for sloppy details, the carton is labeled both “Whole Milk” and “Lowfat Milk”, and the “Cow Fun Puzzle” maze is just goofy.

The Apple TV X account retweeted Cook, and added a credit: “We thought you might like this festive artwork by Keith Thomson, made on MacBook Pro.”

They didn’t tag the “Keith Thomson” who supposedly created this illustration for them, but if it’s this Keith Thomson, Apple must have somehow fallen for a scam, because that Keith Thomson’s paintings are wonderful. It does seem to be that Keith Thomson’s signature on Apple’s sloppy illustration. (I love a bunch of the paintings from that Keith Thomson, but this one in particular f
title: Tim Cook Posts AI Slop in Christmas Message on Twitter/X, Ostensibly to Promote ‘Pluribus’
